you want to install compizconfig-settings-manager, so in a terminal, put: sudo apt-get install compizconfig-settings-manager
done
now you will have an Item under System > Preferences called "Advanced Desktop Effects Settings".
you can control all of the effects from there. It's near the bottom and called "Snapping Windows". You can disable it there
